page.title: 13Playground Games
page.content: We are very lucky in our school to have games painted on our playground. These are a few of the games we play. Evaporation,Snake,Hopscotch and Rocket.Our favourite game is called Ladybird.There is a painted Ladybird but with numbers instead of coloured spots.One person is on and the other people stand on a number.The person who is on turns around and the others run around till the person on shouts STOP!Then they each stand on a number. One of the people who are on the numbers shouts out the numbers on which the people are standing. Supposing you were standing on 6 and the person called out 6 you have to run and touch the wall and get back before they touch you.If they touch you you become on,if they don't touch you,they stay on.
